Issue.creator: bstasyszyn
Issue.summary: Chaincode args are not properly encoded
Issue.description: Both 'chaincode invoke' and 'chaincode query' do not pass the arguments properly. Currently, the string array from the command-line is marshalled into a byte array and that byte array is passed in as the first argument of 'Args'. Instead, each string in the string array should be converted to a byte array and added to 'Args'.
